section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: And finally I have announcement number 72-1690, Spence against Washington and for reason stated in a per curiam opinion filed today, the judgment of the Supreme Court of the State of Washington is reversed.
Mr. Justice Douglas has filed a concurring opinion.
Mr. Justice Blackmun concurs in the judgment.
I have a filed a dissenting statement.
Mr. Justice Rehnquist has filed a dissenting opinion in which Mr. Justice White and I have joined.
